biotools.summary: scDLC is a deep learning classifier (scDLC) for large sample scRNA-seq data, based on the long short-term memory recurrent neural networks (LSTMs). This classifier does not require a prior knowledge on the scRNA-seq data distribution and it is a scale invariant method which does not require a normalization procedure for scRNA-seq data.

bioschemas.name: scDLC
